name: Smorian
description:
''You are a journalist investigating Smory inc, while doing research, watch the door on your left and try to decipher the codes.''

Smorian indie short horror game this part created in 5 days

You need to investigate the mysteries of Smory Inc.

Controls:

Open/Close Door ==> Q

Zoom In Computer ==> E

Zoom Out Computer ==> Space

Return To Menu ==> X

Minimum specs:

Computer

I would be very glad if you leave a comment! 

things i'm thinking about for new updates:

- more passwords

-more jumpscres

- interactive puzzles

- longer game
